Boston.Winthrop Square Tower: Winthrop Square Tower, is a proposed skyscraper planned for Boston, Massachusetts. If completed, Winthrop Square Tower would stand as the third tallest building in Boston, Massachusetts, and New England, surpassing the 60-story Millennium Tower by at least 17 feet (5.2 m). The Winthrop Square tower would be built on the site of the currently defunct Winthrop Square Garage in the Financial District.
